website_summaries.verdict: While they don't look different than other no-name true wireless buds on Amazon, the EarFun Free headphones are a step up from other sub-$50 models.
pros: The EarFun Free has surprisingly good sound for their low price and offer both USB-C and wireless charging
Battery life is decent at 6 hours, with an extra four charges on the go with charging case
cons: They're slightly bulky, may not fit all ears equally well and there's no volume controls on the buds

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for music, even better than my $150 pair of earbuds. They work well with Siri and the button in each earbud is very easy and soft to touch. They fit perfectly in my ear and are very light. Lots of positive to say about these buds, however during phone calls people hear me very low which is the reason I gave it 4 stars. If you don’t use them much to talk on the phone these earbuds are perfect and have become my default pair to enjoy music and podcasts. It is also water proof and I shower with them to not interrupt my podcast.
customer_reviews.author: dd0723

customer_reviews.title: Only one ear bud would pair...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried these, they paired perfectly with my IPhone and sounded great. After that, only one ear bud would pair. I followed all the directions to reset/repair/re try, delete Bluetooth and try again, etc. etc. and nothing would make the other ear bud pair and play. Would have been great if both ear buds would pair, but they would not. If you want more than one ear bud to work, then I suggest that you do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy k

customer_reviews.title: Far better optios
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Good price 2. Nice looking product 3. Great battery life. 4. Easy set-up & connectivity Cons: 1. Noise cancelling nonexistent 2. Sound quality, nothing impressive. 3. Plastic feel, doesnt look durable Bought this for quick 45-60 minute flights and quickly realized they are completely useless. Even at max volume, I struggled to get clear audio from a Netflix movie on flights. Bass like any form of noise cancelling is also nonexistent. I didn't do any further testing as they were unsuitable for the reason I purchased them. My son now is the proud owner of these.
customer_reviews.author: We_got_the_cup_2012

customer_reviews.title: Spotty connection in outside busy locations, otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: It's been a couple of years since I bought new wireless earbuds in hopes that the bluetooth technology has improved, but alas it has not. If you plan on using these in a busy city, e.g. NYC, be prepared for the bluetooth connection to be spotty and cut in and out frequently. When not using out in the streets, it performs just fine. The extended battery life and wireless charging are pluses and a major reason why I purchased as well, hopefully the technology improves in time... UPDATE: After 1 month of use, I've reduced to 1 star, the signal breaks up so frequently outdoors it's almost unusable. I guess quality is sacrificed for battery life...
customer_reviews.author: K. Kazemi

customer_reviews.title: Left bud will not work.
customer_reviews.text: Left ear bud will not pair and have sound. Tried resetting and tried charging fully as well as forgetting the pair and trying again. Will rerate once resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Only one earbud would sync up. There is no volume botton so your stuck on one volume level and it's not loud at all
customer_reviews.author: john breen

customer_reviews.title: The EarFun Free Look Good Sound Good And Are Feature Rich
customer_reviews.text: The EarFun Free Look Good Sound Good And Are Feature Rich. You can get these in either white or black.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Blkphoto Dortch

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Refund Scam
customer_reviews.text: Update... I've had the earbuds for 2 days, and connection is horrible if you're moving at all. Kinda pointless for wireless earbuds. Pairing is also a pain. I had first one, then both cut out in the middle of a run. Also, they sent a card offering a $20 gift card for a 5 Star Review. Which I did because $20 is $20. After following their steps, I was informed that the $20 could only go to PayPal. I asked about other methods, and even told them that it sounded sketchy. Since they haven't replied, I will assume my suspicions were true, hence the genuine review. Go with JayBird instead.
customer_reviews.author: A. Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, terrible mic....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use when playing mobile games - Discord chat, etc. The sound is decent enough and “noise cancellation” seems to be more a matter of how well they plug and fill your ear than anything else. The case is nice, they seem to hold a decent charge as well. That ticked most of the boxes for me until...no one can hear me when I talk! I tested it both with Discord and regular phone calls on my iPhone X - same results. Pretty disappointing. A poor mic is a deal breaker for me, so these are being returned to Amazon. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Noctaire

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I use these for listening to audio books while walking. The sound quality and noise cancellation is fine when they work. Sometimes they are not sufficiently charged, even after overnight in the case. They lose pairing periodically, one or the other stops working intermittently. They are extremely uncomfortable , but start out seeming to be securely inserted and sound good. Eventually one or the other loosens and falls out of the ear; none of the rubber cover sizes makes a difference. I was away for 2 weeks and inadvertently missed the return deadline or I would have returned them. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money and feature set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my $250 Plantronics buds stopped working 1 hour after I set them up. These work amazingly well for cheap earbuds. Call quality is just ok to not very good for the called side. Fit is crappy. I've tried all the sizes and they all eventually slide out. Overall pretty much as I expected for cheap earbuds and I would recommend them even with the quality/fit caveats. I'm using them mainly for listening to audio books in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought these earphones based on the claim of Bluetooth 5, which allows for pairing with multiple devices. I have several bluetooth devices in my home: Amazon Dots, Yamaha R-N303 receiver, laptops, phones. The ONLY device these earbuds would connnect with was my iPhone. Would not connect with any other device, even after unpairing from phone. I should also point out that, in the brief time I used them, the sound quality was less than stellar. So one star on that point. Bottom line is that I sent mine back within two hours of delivery - not worth the time I invested in attempting to make them work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied- Broken Already
customer_reviews.text: They appear to be broken already less than a week after purchasing them. The left earbud puts out barely any sound compared to the right. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David McBride

customer_reviews.title: Had to put 1 in rice
customer_reviews.text: So, let me say that I love these earbuds, but they had me worried. One of them dropped in the shower and didn't work right until I left it over night in a bag of rice (I have a special bag of rice for just this reason). It wasn't the fall, it was the water. These are supposed to be able to withstand swimming, and the shower is clearly not a swimming environment. I think if you are going to look for reliable waterproof earbuds, you may wish to look elsewhere. But I want to stress, I really like these earbuds, so I dont want to be too harsh.... happy listening!
customer_reviews.author: batrat

customer_reviews.title: Could not create a good seal.
customer_reviews.text: I tried all included tips and none of them created a good seal. The quality of the silicon/plastic is not very good and the earbuds are not very comfortable as a result. The volume on these earbuds are relatively no with very faint bass. I'm going to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Fjbidder

customer_reviews.title: Great for listening to music but horrible for calls
customer_reviews.text: I got these in the new reality of WFH I'm on the phone or zoom calls ALL THE TIME. Thought getting some wireless buds would make life easier. These ear buds are great for listening to music but the sound quality for a phone call or a zoom call is horrible. Got on a zoom call and had horrible feedback and they said it sounded like i was whispering. On a regular call I was told I was really faint. The buds themselves also hurt my ears. The small buds were too small and the medium ones were just a little too big. Returning them asap.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I purchase as a last minute item since I lost my Jabra Elites on a flight from Spain, needless to say I was hesitant on purchasing something under $100, but I must say it is worth and I have been using them on all my iOS and Windows devices, granted unpairing and pairing between 5 devices is crazy but I enjoy the sound and the quality is very good so far!! I will recommend if you want to enjoy good sound from music, video, and calls. I must warn you the range starts to fall apart after 15 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Winston M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Left ear bud quit working about 10 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in November, so as of today the 5th of January 2020, the warranty has expired. I have used these for no more than 10 hours, as I listen to Podcasts, occasonally. I talked to a support person at amazon and he was not able to help me get the left ear bud working and has referred my to the company. The company sent me an email saying they would send me a new set and I did not need to return the old. Keep posted. Company followed through with promise to replace free of charge. I now have paired both buds and am listening to podcasts
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Clean the contacts after every use. Don't be me!
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the left bud not charging. I wrote to the company and tech support said to clean the charging contacts with a q-tip. Now I keep my ears clean and could not see anything that would interfere with the contact. But I did as I was instructed and sure enough they charged right up. So now after wearing them for awhile I clean them with a micro fiber cloth and put them back in the charging case. Very happy with quality of the product. Sound is amazing! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stained glass man

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fantastic customer service, but uncomfortable and bad microphone
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to facilitate working from home since I'm on the phone all day. The sound cancellation and sound quality are excellent, but the earbuds are painful to wear for any extended period of time and the microphone leaves a lot to be desired. Most of my clients have trouble hearing me unless I'm speaking loudly enough to disturb my neighbors. Update: added 2 stars for stellar customer service. The company reached out to me to offer a potential solution in the form of a different product. Looking into that now. Star added for good customer service with enough attention to detail to spell my name correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: These have great battery life. The charge in the case lasts a long time. Theses are a bit bulky compared to my last set. The would not stay in my ears with the provided tips....any time I'd move my head they would fall out. Could have to do with my ears, though with my previous less bulky ear buds I had no issues. So I made my own tips out of some ear plugs and tubing. Now they stay in my ears and provide great noise cancelation. Without my custom tips these were only good when I was sitting still.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G.

customer_reviews.title: A false start, but redemption in the end
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work. Tried them once and everything sounded great. Tried them a second time and I can only get sound out of the right earbud. For whatever reason, the left earbud won't connect. Followed the instructions for resetting several times and tested with other different BT devices (tablet, phone, pc, etc.) All the same: Only sound in the right earbud. I emailed the company about this issue. Waiting to hear what they say, but I'll probably be sending these back. Update. Company was awesome. I emailed them about the issue and sent me a new set at no cost. This set works well. For the price and company support, they are a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A company that stands behind their product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. I only charged them once and the battery never drain but after a moth, the right earphone stopped working. It doesn't charge when in the case. The left one still working normal but why do I want one only? Don't waste your money. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ UPDATE: The seller saw my review and contacted me. They offered a refund or new earbuds. Which is what I took. They sent the 2020 version and they are so awesome and a bit louder with nice bass. Thanks for standing behind your product. AA battery for size comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised with the sound quality. Even without using any equalizer they sound great. It would be better to have more volume reserve, when using them with a phone I must increase volume to 100% to hear everything well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN CONTROL VOLUME WITH DOUBLE TAP
customer_reviews.text: Only writing a review to spread the word: if you double tap on the left earbud -> volume down; if you double tap on the right earbud -> volume up. I don't know if this is a 2020 update thing or what, but apparently no one knows this in the Amazon reviews. Even says so in the instruction manual (yes, I read instruction manuals, bite me). Oh and they sound pretty good. I also like the noise isolation they provide. Better than my previous neck buds. Would recommend. ................................................................................... DOUBLE CLICK TO CHANGE VOLUME LEVEL ...................................................................................
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these for a week, but they are a solid wireless earphone set for a good price. They are pretty comfortable, not a perfect fit, but they don’t fall out (haven’t tested them on a run yet). The sound quality is excellent. My only complaint is that I wish the bass was a bit more pronounced, not even a basshead, it’s just that the lows are hard to notice. Battery life hasn’t been an issue. Totally worth the $37 that they are going for at this time. *Edit* since using these more, I’ve noticed that there is more bass presence that I first noticed. I personally could do with more low end but it’s definitely there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid runner up comparing these with more expensive buds but I found a pair that were better!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to a pair of Mozart branded TWS off amazon i got last year and the M&D MW07 these have comparable sound and bass but way better battery life along with IPX7. Love that they are waterproof and work in the shower flawlessly. However recently got a pair of Cepekyy TWS-H01 to compare because there was a 40% coupon and they have touch controls WITH volume control and they are significantly smaller so they are much more comfortable. The Cepekyy won me over with stronger bass and comfort so I will be returning these although they are pretty solid for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price with some compromises
customer_reviews.text: Advantages: - Price - Speed of charging - Size and portability - Magnetic case - Speed of pairing/connecting Disadvantages: - Some connection issues: occasionally they won't transmit sound until I disconnect and reconnect them. Happens both with my PC and my Android. - Sound quality in phone calls is inferior compared to wired headset. It seems that the microphone is too sensitive. People keep complaining that they hear lots of ambient/street noises loudly. Perhaps the fact that the mic is not close the mouth brought the designers to make it too sensitive. - Insufficient selection of tips. Only three sizes in rubber. No foam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money, best earpods I've used!
customer_reviews.text: They're very light, but don't let that fool you into thinking they're cheap. These earpods have a great battery life, pair incredibly easily and are perfect for music and podcasts alike. The microphone is very sensitive and I've never had issues being heard on calls, which was a big factor in my choice of earpods. Additionally, I had an issue where my charging case stopped working just outside the return period for Amazon. I contacted EarFun and because I was still covered by the warranty they'd send me a new one, free of charge. The customer service was impeccable and if I ever need a new set, I'll be buying another pair from EarFun.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: Love these earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these buds because of a C-Net review and thought they were a good option within my price range. I found that they have a very comfortable fit and good sound. It's not fantastic but it's good. Regarding Noise Cancellation, I don't think it has much but the fit is snug enough to block out most noise. Also, the retail box does not mention noise cancellation so I assume it has none. The battery life is great. They recharge every time you place them in the storage container so I never felt that they were likely to fail. Never used them for more than an hour at a time though. I would recommend, particularly at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: WolyBoly

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life with nice sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation works pretty OK but overall its great. The earbuds are such a sweet, sleek nature while retaining a solid yet lightweight build, fit beautifully in the ear, don't slip off.Overall, with my buy, I am more than pleased and would suggest anyone searching for a pretty cheap set of Bluetooth earbuds. I run for some time and did not shift or break. Without any question, a combined headphone and Android apps. The wireless range is very strong. When working in the garden and telephone at home, I can listen to music comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money BUT !!!! 😰
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!! I can tell this is above good product for the price and the quality. Batteries are good . Sound : excellent The only reason for i gave star is the following: - not really comfortable. 2/5 - can not hold easly on ear even using any kind of foam with earpiece. Overal it worth the money spent , and you'll be amazed by the sound quality. As a reminder for people who complain about connectivity: IF YOUR PHONE DO NOT SUPPORT BLUETOOTH 5.0 YOU WILL HAVE A CONNECTIVITY ISSUE , OTHERWISE IF YOU HAVE A NEW PHONE OR NEWER HARDWARE YOU WILL ALWAYS HAVE AN EXCELLENT CONNECTIVITY AND PAIRED EASLY . Willing to return
customer_reviews.author: keyan

customer_reviews.title: Constantly cutting out
customer_reviews.text: These are great when they work. Which is only sometimes. All other times, audio cuts out or goes robotic or delays and then speeds up to try to catch up with whatever I'm watching. The signal cuts out whenever I turn my head despite a clear line of sight to the Bluetooth adapter plugged into my computer, less than two feet away. I've updated drivers; un-paired and re-paired; modified my router's 2.4 GHz WiFi signal strength; permanently unpaired these from my phone. Yet still, I cannot get a consistent sound nor signal from these earbuds. At least I can use them as expensive ear plugs, I guess. They're great at blocking out the office noises I deal with at work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price with some caveates
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but really wish the left bud worked separate from the right. Sound quality is great but have had issues with the bud not sitting properly in the case despite the case being closed. Because it isn't sitting properly it sometimes connects to my phone when the case is shut which interferes with other Bluetooth devices I may already be connected too. That being said I think it's worth the price for good sounding truly wireless earbuds. Using it for phone calls is ok - not horrible - not amazing but decent for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: iShopTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, decent battery life, but for some reason the earbuds would not charge when returned to the case. I think the metal contacts were not designed well. Also, the earbuds were not very consistent in pausing when removed and they do not turn off when placed in the case. This is annoying because they will continue to play without you knowing. These are not issues with Apple AirPods, but then you’re not paying the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fit and great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I find it hard to get earbuds that fit well. Something about the shape or sensitivity of my ears make most of them uncomfortable for me. These have a unique shape that fits really well in my ear. They are more than loud enough as they block out most extraneous sounds with the good fit. The battery has outlasted my listening sessions, and the case recharges them multiple times. The case has a magnetic fit to ensure charging. The sound is really nice, and when I had a small problem with one of the earbuds, the seller responded immediately to resolve it.
customer_reviews.author: R Shain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: I've had the EarFun earbuds for a week now. They sound as good as I expected for the price (maybe better!). I use them mostly while doing yard work and they are a welcome replacement for the foam earplugs I usually use for hearing protection while mowing. Comfort is good, not great, and in my opinion a touch control button for volume, pause and changing tracks, as opposed to a physical button, would help with comfort, especially after having them in for an hour or two or three... Battery life is excellent and I love the charging case. Wireless charging on the case is also bonus! The case's design is simple and functional! Overall, I'm VERY pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RoadWarrior6613

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds for the price! Fit not the best
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality- overall good, mids and lows a bit off. The bass is not a deep as I would like. They are pretty clear and the noise cancellation is great. Fit- the seem alittle bulky. Even with the 3 sets of ear buds. I just can't seem to find the best one. Charging Case- the earbuds are hard to remove from the charger I will update on battery life at a different date. Updated: Only had a month. The battery life is great. The fit of the buds are better the longer I wore them. Sound is still pretty good. I would recommend them to anyone looking not to spend a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: lkhv

customer_reviews.title: Nicely priced set of earbuds with great company behind them
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these buds. I use a set at my desk for phone call while my wife wears a set at night for music. We've both been very happy with our experiences: we've gotten a good, comfortable fit for each of us and the charge holds well. Battery capacity is a bigger issue for my wife because she wants to get through the night where my use is for shorter periods. I'm especially happy with the support I've gotten from EarFun. We had a bluetooth pairing issue with 1 bud and EarFun was immediately responsive and got the problem fixed. ...a very good customer experience.
customer_reviews.author: mdgarnett

customer_reviews.title: great idea with wireless charging
customer_reviews.text: I am still on the fence on these.. I got these on a after Christmas sale and thought I'd try these.. seems this type are very popular and with wireless charging, I can put the base on my wireless charger.. I can put them on the Samsung wireless charger and it works.. one less charging cable! they do sound good, the distance from the phone or iPad is pretty good.. I don't know how waterproof they are.. I wont be taking them to the hot tub or pool.. But I do have trouble keeping the right one in my ear if I yawn or talk much... one thing I did notice..
customer_reviews.author: Ghost rider

customer_reviews.title: Good for listening, not talking
customer_reviews.text: First few calls people said it wasn't the best but was clear and loud enough to talk on. After that, people seem to have a hard time hearing. They say the sound is in and out. That's with me and the phone sitting still, quiet room, just a few feet away. As for listening, they seem to work pretty well. Decent sound. Extra ear pads like most come with now.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Schmon

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Fast pairing, good battery life, can use one bud individually, it hits all the points. Getting the fit right in your ear is a little tricky, but a little twist will do. I've charged these once in the past 2 weeks I've had them, super solid. Sound quality is decent, on par with my Souncore Liberty Air from Anker, but I do like how these look in my ear more than the Ankers. Decent as in not bad but not super good lows, mids, and highs. Nothing stands out too much, but I have my headphones for when I really can focus and listen to music. These are perfect and don't fall out when gardening, working out, skating, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Sounds Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for earbuds that I could use all day, when running listening to music and podcasts. Water and sweat resistance was a must and a good fit with better than average sound quality as I listen to a lot of music and take calls. These earbuds deliver as promised. They do feel a little bit cheap when you first hold them, but when you put them in to listen, they feel super comfy. I walked and ran around with them in, they felt secure, stayed in place no problems. You get skip forward/back, volume up/down, answer/end call, play and pause. Battery life has been excellent. For the money they're great. A great buy for me!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound but Low Volume
customer_reviews.text: Thia is my 3rd pair of wireless Bluetooth earbuds. The sound quality is great however I find myself turning them up all the way when listening to music on my Samsung S8 phone. They do connect quickly however even this morning when watching videos on Amazon.com, the right earbud kept co0nnecting them disconnecting multiple times. I also find that the volume some of the content on YouTube is not loud enough to enjoy. It just seems odd that I would have o turn the volume up all the way just to listen to music. Maybe I got a bad pair. I just wish I could get more volume out of them
customer_reviews.author: F. May

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: These would be the perfect earbuds but the following things are a disappoinment: -random sound spikes in the left earbud -sometimes earbuds have to be placed back into case inorder to hear music -the supplied silicon tips are not sufficient in keeping a tight seal. Earfun should consider placing earfins in the package with their future earbuds; this might recitify the seal issue. Other than the aforementioned complaints, I truly like these buds. The sound is well-balanced (focus is primarily on the highs and mids but the lows are still good), lightweight, and both the buds and case charge quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: First, I bought these for working out. My Apple AirPods kept falling out and didn’t have a good seal with them. A third of the price and holy cow what a better sound and more functional for what I needed them for. Second, didn’t have any issues setting these up. They connected immediately to my IPhone 11. Now the only thing I would say negatively about these is that they don’t go loud enough. The bass from these are great, but they could get a little more volume in them. Overall I’m happy with them, and it prevented me from spending over $200 for another set of Apple buds.
customer_reviews.author: DWW

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: These are really good wireless earbuds for the price. Sound quality is great. They pair easily. Battery life so far seems great (only had a few months). My only complaint is that (for me) they don't stay in my ears well when I lay down/stand up. I primarily use these in bed, and whenever I get up or lay down I have to reseat them in my ears. I've tried all the tip sized. And I've tried buying memory foam tips to replace the ones that come with them, but they didn't fit on the EarFun. Walking around they stay in no problem. I haven't tried them while exercising. But on the whole I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex and Heather Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good Quality Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: This earbud really amazing as I was quite disappointed with few other earbuds I bought earlier. I use headphones or earphones a lot everyday. Therefore, after using Sony headphone for a long time, I was looking for a earbud that will be small so it will be almost invisible from front side. Therefore, I bought this earbud and I am quite surprised with this earbuds. So far, I am quite happy with the choice. Pros: 1. Amazing sound quality 2. Very Comfortable; I can wear it for a long time 3. No problem with Bluetooth connection 4. Good call quality 5. Touch is ok Cons: 1. Switching devices is painful 2. charging box can be improved
customer_reviews.author: Aowal

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking stop comparing these are great!
customer_reviews.text: 8/23 updated- Still LOVE these!! Amazing, much happier than i anticipated i would be....ORIGINAL -Initially I thought they may be a little big. . NOT at all. I was also scared about the Bluetooth quality. NEVER have I had wireless earphones that didn't disconnect or get staticy just by turning my head. I was able to set my phone down and walk over 40 ft away and still crystal clear. When I put them in I was inside walked out for my trashcan didn't even hear the neighbor mowing the lawn. . . ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE. Left one Right one don't matter both work separately or together. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for phone usage
customer_reviews.text: Pros-The earbuds fit fairly well and keep a nice low profile in the ear. They didn't connect with the first try but did the 2nd time. The battery life is amazing especially with the charging case! Cons-I bought these earbuds to replace my cumbersome Plantronics Legend earpiece however, the sound quality to the person on the other end of the phone is terrible! It's sporadic and when they can here me, which is only about 1/3 of the time, it's terrible sound. The sound is so bad, they should just call these earbuds for music only...not for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The best sounding cost effective wireless ear buds I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product - I put them up against a number of wireless earbuds, and these sounded the best - at half the price. AND they're waterproof. Almost no one else's are. BUT, they do not have active noise cancellation built it. Its slight of hand on the rating that they claim it does. For that, i'm withdrawing one star. The noise cancelling is just from the way the earbud fits, not from any active technology (like say some of the Bose or Amazon echo buds). The waterproof feature is super cool tho - used them in the pool and a shower with great quality. Wonderful sound quality - great job!
customer_reviews.author: nturner66

customer_reviews.title: Fits average sized ears, great noise cancellation, stay put while running
customer_reviews.text: I have average-size ears, drive a convertible, and work out regularly. I was looking for something that would fit comfortably in-ear. Pros: -Excellent noise cancellation (even while running, skating, driving) -Fairly low-profile, even from the front -Very good sound quality -Comfortable for my average-sized ears, even after several hours -Did not move even with jogging for 60+ minutes, shaking my head, inverting, etc. -Battery life -Super easy to sync -Can use one or both -Decent Bluetooth range - I tested it to 30+ feet with two walls in between Cons: -Occasional brief connectivity issues, but restored quickly on its own* (*I was way out in the woods, and I think this was actually my Pandora cutting out.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Here the music
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband to wear under his helmet while he us riding his motorcycle. He said that he can hear most of the radio stations really well. He can also hear his phone call pretty well. There's an occasional interference but that maybe his signal. Also, sometimes the volume for the stations are not clear. For the money we would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Debi K.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star customer service 1 star product
customer_reviews.text: When the product worked I really enjoyed the sound quality and fit. Problem was the right ear bud kept powering off. I contacted the company and they gave me a couple troubleshooting methods unfortunately none of them worked. They sent me a replacement pair and within a week I was having the exact same issue. Again the company stepped up and gave me some more steps in trying to fix them and were very apologetic. Sad to say these fixes did not work either. Earfun did initiate refunding my purchase price. Kuddos to them for trying so hard to keep customer happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE : To 4.50 stars :Left pod stopped working after 1ST charge
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE : Customer service contacted me and got it all fixed in done . There a good set of ear buds. One of the best part is how far you can walk away from your device and they still come in clear. I left my in my car in the garage and it still transmitted through 4 walls and to the back pool area. Amazing. The left ear pod stopped working after 1st charge. Contacted Ear Fun they told me to return it. Also the instruction that came with it where way off. You have to read all the questions and answers here to see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: gldtobfl

customer_reviews.title: Left earphone will not maintain a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought nor tried earbuds before and initially was pleased with my purchase. However, after charging over and over I have not been able to get my left earphone to charge. I have Googled to find a solution and for the last two months not been able to correct this deficiency. I am VERY disappointed and disheartened. EarFun was anything but! DO NOT BUY THIS Wireless Earbuds EarFun Free Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds with Wireless Charging Case!!! TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Mata

customer_reviews.title: Solid good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set (the first pair might have accidentally been shipped somewhere). The sound is solid with strong base. Battery life is great, I use them a lot. Good comfort, and easy to use. Pair effortlessly to my Moto X2 with a decent range. The white color are easier to find :). Two cons: the units are tad slippery so be careful when pulling them out while walking. The buttons work well for stop/start music or answer calls, but the next/prior song is a little tricky. Snug fit for exercise. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few days then had problems
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with these ear buds for the first few days but they soon after started to have connection issues. They intermittently have a problem where either the right or left will drop sound for a few seconds. It seems to be worse when my phone is in my pocket. It is very annoying and I usually just turn them off. I'll probably return them.
customer_reviews.author: Pirahna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these headphones. They felt comfortable, had pretty decent sound quality, & came in at a reasonable price. The downside was that you have 2 separate ear buds that have to be charged in their case & keeping up with all three components was sometimes a struggle for me. Additionally, the left bud wouldn't charge unless i placed it very carefully into the correct position. A lot of times I was just listening to one earbud because of this. Overall this wasn't a huge problem & I could usually get it to charge after a minute of adjustment. Not a bad product, but I'm unsure if I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hensley

customer_reviews.title: sounds great! microphone terrible
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for good sound, good fit, and easy set up, then get these! If the microphone is at all important to you keep looking. I really wanted them to work for me but I need to make phone calls and use them in video conferences and I sounded terrible - like I was under water and far away. I gave them 3 stars because most people want the first three features. I can't live without a good mic. UPDATE: the company sent me a replacement set with no questions. The mic still isn't what I need but the sound, fit, and easy of set up are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: When I’m not listening to anything I definitely have to take them out because of how good a job they do at noise canceling. The sound is fantastic, they are very comfortable, and the fact that their little case acts as a built in charger for them and acts as a portable charger by itself when disconnected from the wall was a pleasant surprise. For the price I wasn’t expecting anything nearly as high quality or amazing as these turned out to be. They are one of the best purchases I’ve made on Amazon and that’s saying something!
customer_reviews.author: TACPness!

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to switch to Bluetooth earbuds for my daily walks for some time, but I kept running into two problems. One, they sounded like garbage, and two, they constantly fell out of my ear regardless of what size plugs I used. Then I found EarFun. I took a chance and purchased them and I must say it was an excellent decision. The sound quality is better than any plugin earbuds I have used, and they stay put no matter if I'm walking or running. I am very satisfied with the EarFun Bluetooth Earbuds and I recommend them with enthusiasm.
customer_reviews.author: Teufelshund63

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: The EARFUN bluetooth 5.0 wireless headphones with HD stereo sound, good bass and very clear. They are perfect for exercising with them because they are resistant to sweat, also to rain. The 500mAh charging case that can charge the headphones multiple times and can be charged with the USB-C cable (included). Includes various sizes of eartips. They are very easy to connect to your cell phone, after the first pairing and only when it is stored in the charging case, please close and re-open and re-pair it automatically. You can also use them independently.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Seem pretty good.  Haven't used a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good. Comfort is OK. I wear headphone when I walk my dog. They are almost too quiet. And while they sound great when I am just sitting, when I am walking, the motion of walking creates a bit of a woosh, woosh, woosh with my steps. Not sure why that is but as a result I am not using them as much as I thought I would. Also, the over the head headphones go on and off quicker. Too bad. But still seem like a good value and I will probably use them for sailing in the summer (waterproof).
customer_reviews.author: J. Nieling

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck! And great customer support, too
customer_reviews.text: I'll begin by saying I almost sent these back. They fit and sound great, but every call I made, the person on the other end said I was cutting out real bad. Instead I reached out to EarFun customer support, who replied quickly with a step by step (with pictures) walk through on how to update the firmware. Ever since, they've worked great! I use these for normal usage, but also to run. I only use one at a time, and they do work independently (except the volume controls are up on one ear, and down on the other). I haven't had any problems keeping them in my ears, and they've handled my sweat well, too
customer_reviews.author: EaGreenlee

customer_reviews.title: She loves them....
customer_reviews.text: Despite them not being apple white.....Bought as a gift for my daughter and she loves them. They aren't very big so they are comfortable yet don't feel like they will fall out. No complaints about the sound quality, she likes them. Case is small enough to carry around without being intrusive. She wears them a lot so the battery life is pretty long. She's an apple person so the USB C port is a negative for her. But the charge cable is included so it's a minor annoyance, if at all. Sounds, battery, portability, price = great value
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B

customer_reviews.title: No good...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these, especially for the price. First pair sounded great and seemed to last a long time until about the 3rd or 4th use. Then they stopped holding a charge and were useless. I decided to just get a replacement pair and give them another chance. First few times worked fine and then wouldn't hold a charge again. Yes I charged them thoroughly from a device and not just from the case. Happy that everyone else seems to be having good luck with these hence the positive rating but that definitely wasn't my experience. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Computabuddha

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of wireless earbuds, and these are my favorite so far. They have all the things I need - impressive range, battery life, noise cancellation, fit, and design. I appreciate the fact the controls have to be clicked as opposed to just touched so that there are not as many accidental commands given to the device if I attempt to arrange my hair or adjust the earbud's position. I have been well-pleased with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone in the market for adorable Bluetooth earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Q2theT

customer_reviews.title: Good - amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I just left these on overnight (after using them for a few hours) and when I woke up 12 hours later they were still on just fine and played audio when I tested. They weren't playing anything overnight, but they were on and connected to my phone, so the battery life on standby is pretty darn amazing. Have had it about a month - if anything battery life seems better than expected, but I do pause the music habit so it isn't continuous. Pretty good at blocking outside noise, as long as you turn volume up a little.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for young teens
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed by my teenager, the user of these earbuds Overall rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Sound quality: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ How comfortable: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Ease of use: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ These EARFUN BLUETOOTH 5.0 EARBUDS are good for the sub $50 price. They are easy to use and setup and have both good sound quality and battery life. A very useful feature they have is the ability to pause music/videos by pressing the button on the side of them as well as the charging case. One con is that after over four hours of continuous use, they become uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wieber

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones for the NON iphone user
customer_reviews.text: Recieved these because I wanted inner ear headphones but dont have an apple. So I found these and the other reviews looked decent. I was sort of skeptical these would stay in my ears. Gotta say they do. Was surprised that they fit snuggled in my ears while moving around. Came with multiple ear tips for ear sizing. Havent tried running yet but mowed the lawn and they gave our decent sound. Battery life seems decent too. It advertises 10 minutes charging for 2 hours of life. I'm skeptical but so far no issues with battery life. I reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hutelmyer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ear buds for a 6 months, then the right ear started to decrease in volume each time i used them, the left still sounds as good as new but the right one is useless. I tried to contact the company on their web page but no response. Update: They promptly sent a replacement pair once I spoke with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite true wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I've been using 2 other sets of wireless earbuds, and both of them were difficult to control using on ear buttons. The Earfun buds provide usable tactile feedback that make it easy. I've not tried using the Qi wireless charging, but that should make charging very simple. The fact that Earfun use type C usb is also a significant plus over some other competitors. The sound is good, although I was unable to get it to very loud levels. It was fine for me, but others my find it insufficient. I highly recommend these 2020 Earfun true wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry T

customer_reviews.title: These work very well
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any previous experience with this type of product, so maybe there is a reason why it's unpleasant to use these to talk on the phone. I can hear myself talking (in my head, not like stereo) and it seems to make my eardrum vibrate. I'm not sure how to describe it. But I don't like it. Otherwise, I'm very impressed. I usually have a lot of problems getting things to fit inside my ears, but these seal very well. The sound is great, the battery is great. Don't let my inexperience dissuade you. I think these are a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort, but mine developed problems.
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, very comfortable, and good battery life. However, the pair I received eventually stopped working properly. The sound output in one earbud dropped drastically, making them unusable. Since the return window had passed, I reached out to customer service, who provided troubleshooting ideas. When those steps failed, they sent a replacement pair. The new pair developed the same problem as the originals, so they again sent a replacement pair, which also failed after two weeks. Ultimately, the company provided a refund. I may have had issues with the product, but my customer service experience was excellent. They responded promptly, appropriately, and ultimately made sure I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RedRover69

customer_reviews.title: These are a good quality set of earbuds that are simple to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are a good quality set of earbuds that are simple to set up and easy to use. The audio is great on both music and phone calls. In fact, the phone call was phenomenal quality for earbuds. The case is chargeable with either the USB C cord provided or with a wireless charger. The earbuds disconnect and turn off when put into the case and turn on and automatically re connect when you take them out of the case. I am not sure yet how many times the case will recharge the earbuds before needing to be recharged itself. These are a great set of earbuds for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Maybe great for music, didn't have much success with voice
customer_reviews.text: I don't listen to much music and wear ear buds for phone calls and pod casts. I couldn't make the adjustment from 1st gen Air Pods to these. Treble was quite muted and my wife commented about a moderate degradation in voice quality when we would talk during commutes. In my case, I also found the snug fit challenging when trying to wear just one in order to maintain awareness of surrounding noise or conversations -- maybe I am auditorily-challenged, but unfortunately could not find the benefit that so many others (including industry awards) highlight.
customer_reviews.author: ABD

customer_reviews.title: Great budget wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Setup: The earbuds paired with my Android phone just by pulling them from the box. Exactly like setup should be. Fit: The ear tips that were on it seemed fine so I don't know about swapping them out. Running with them seems okay so far although I did have one fall out (might have not been pushed in all the way) too soon. Sound: I listen to mostly podcasts so my review is probably not worth much on this area. Battery life: I use them mostly an hour at a time and it doesn't seem like I put a dent in the battery at all. Excellent product so far
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at an inexpensive cost
customer_reviews.text: These little buds sound really good. I like they automatically connect when you take them out of the charger/storage box so there's no button pushing and waiting. Put them in, select your listening choice and off you go. The silicone ear pieces work well, but for real isolation you should get some form of foam like the4 Comply brand. They seal out sound as completely as possible. I've had these about a month now and have used them working out, mowing pasture and the work pretty well as shooting ear plugs too. Would definitely buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Fortsbest

customer_reviews.title: Can charge with USB-C and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: My first fully waterproof earbuds. Amazing!! The sound quality is very good. I like the fit if these better than other ones I’ve used. Connecting to Bluetooth was easy and the audio stays in sync thanks to the Bluetooth 5.0. Battery life is not an issue and it recharged fast. Finally, there is earbuds that use USB-C! Much easier and faster than the USB-A. Very happy with these buds.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Chau

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Music quality is good and the design is a bit bigger than some of the other earbuds I've seen. Unfortunately no one can hear me during phone calls. Unless I cupped my hands slightly over the earbuds and talked loudly. It was very difficult for the other person to hear me otherwise. The battery life is not bad from what I've experienced. Maybe it was defective and a one off. For $50 it's not bad and will certainly do the job for someone not looking to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great buds!
customer_reviews.text: My son also bought these and loves them. I bought mine after reading reviews and I'm thrilled. We both enjoy the sound, the noise cancellation is just enough to soften outside sounds but not eliminate them. Stuck at home with the family, it's nice to be able to listen to computer or ipad programs on my own. Great features. Easy to transition from computer to ipad or phone. Reasonably comfortable (I'm not a fan of ear buds in general) Love the magnetic case - the buds immediately pop into the case nice and secure. Fast charge and lasts long. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Deepo

customer_reviews.title: Good to listening, not for talking.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good and battery life is good. Quick to charge. It's absolutely awful for video calls or calls in general. The other line always says that they cannot hear me or the voice is breaking up (it's not my internet connection). Very frustrating experience since I have to do so many calls these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sounding buds with a wireless charging case is a plus!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the case, and really like the bass response on these earbuds. I found them to seal well and hold in place well. The wireless charging case is a huge plus after converter to mostly wireless chargers in my house it is really convenient to set them on one and have it charge and not have to worry about forgetting to charge my earbuds when I got to gym so far they have survived a few gym sessions without and major defects or breakdowns would definitely recommend if you are looking for earbuds that hs a wireless charging case!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very thin sound
customer_reviews.text: 1. The pairing is easy. 2. The connection is very reliable, no dropouts for about 1 hour walking around the house with phone not in my pocket 3. The sound is clear, but very thin, bass is virtually nonexistent 4. Noise reduction (there is no active noise cancellation on these) is average. There is only one rubber set, maybe my ears are larger and require larger rubber set. 5. Didn’t check the battery life, I assume is okay.
customer_reviews.author: jjddbg

customer_reviews.title: Connecting? Great! Phone quality? Music quality...
customer_reviews.text: Updated 5/21/2020 After charging, theses buds connect with your phone & other Bluetooth items immediately. Battery life beyond advertised. Great fit. Charging case looks okay and keeps buds charged. Phone quality is acceptable for calls and video conferencing. Music.... no base at all and you are going to be disappointed if you expect great sounding music. It’s okay. For all of this, the price at $50.00 is just right. Earlier I was set to return, now I am keeping for daily use and updating grades.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: My techie son-in-law found these for me after I complained about the terrible earbuds I had at the time. These don’t fit as securely in my ears but they work! Great sound, & wonderful for phone calls and audiobooks. Wouldn’t use while jogging , but for use while gardening or walking you can’t beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Mind Blowing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used wireless ear buds before but compared to ANY wired earbuds I've used, these provide remarkable sound and bass response. And they fit quite snuggly without coming lose or falling out. I first heard about these from a review I read on CNET and these were their top pick. I wear them around the house doing chores, on long walks with my dog and on long bike rides. They charge quickly and last up to 6 hours on one charge. I can't imagine paying more than this for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fuss free pairing
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds fit fairly comfortables and best of all for a non-techie like myself, the pairing was fuss-free and painless. These shipped internationally and were well packaged. The case to hold the ear buds is sleek and feels quite sturdy. Am no audio expert but sound quality is fine and I could walk around my apartment, even into the bedroom and still hear the music with my phone left out in the living room. Have not tested the ear buds outdoors yet or while running but overall am well pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Island Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but quickly have charging issues.
customer_reviews.text: They sound fine. The battery life is good. Unfortunately the charging contacts on the earbuds sit right against the skin so they get oil from your skin in them. This causes them to not charge properly. The contacts in the case get really bummed up and are nearly impossible to clean. Because of this they can sit in the charger all night and not charge and they randomly lose contact with the charging case so will connect to your phone or other device even when you’re not trying to use them.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent and the buds fit securely and comfortably in my ears. I’ve worn them bike riding, jogging and dancing (just to see if they’d stay in when I jerked my head around) and they have always remained securely in place. Pairing is a breeze and the charging case lasts for weeks, which is convenient for on the go hassle-free charging. The sound blocking is also very good. Perhaps too good. I can barely hear any outside noises when using them. I feel safer and more aware of my environment when wearing only one when out in public walking, biking or jogging.
customer_reviews.author: TMCinSF

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for the price.
customer_reviews.text: After diving through tons of bluetooth earbud reviews, these are definitely the ones to go with if you don't have the money to spend on AirPods. Not only is connecting them to devices INCREDIBLY easy, but their battery life is great. Is the sound brilliant? Of course not. But if you just want a way to listen to music on your run without dealing with wires, these are perfect. And the case is magnetic, which makes losing them pretty difficult, and there's an indicator to tell you if the buds are fully-charged.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: As usual, I'm skeptical about cheap anything especially when it comes to earbuds. No issues pairing these to my Google Pixel, came already charged up. They actually sound better that my Galaxy earbuds I paid $120 for last year. If anything goes wrong with them, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and long lasting battery earbuds for an economical price.
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds arrived quickly at our home after I placed the order. After an overnight charge, the unit was easily connected to my phone bluetooth. The earbuds fit perfectly in my ears with not much force and they stay securely in the ears. The music that came out was excellent, the treble was clear and crisp. the bass was sufficient. I like the long lasting battery which afforded me long sessions of music enjoyment. The water proof feature is really nice, I wear the earbuds while taking a shower. I would highly recommend these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Vu

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth time I've bought a Bluetooth headset this year, and this is the most satisfying for me. First, it has a very long standby time, I can enjoy long-lasting music all day and every day when I am working. The second is the earbuds are very light and comfortable. My ear hole are very small, usually I feel hurt a lot when I wear other earbuds for a long time, but this one is very fit and comfort for all-day wearing with no pain. And the charging is convenient, the carry case can be charged via USB-C or a wireless charger pad. All in all I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Always ready to use!
customer_reviews.text: If you like having your wireless earbuds always charged and ready for use, then this is it! Decent sound, waterproof, great fit and excellent value makes these perfect for the gym. I’m able to workout, hit the sauna and hot tub, and shower as they continue to function. Just don’t forget to wash your ears.....
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice without spending a lot of money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for when I walk. First thing I did was put them in my ears and shake my head. They do not fall out. Sound quality for price point is excellent. Not the best noise canceling, but that is a bonus since I almost didn't order because if that- I need to hear what is around me when walking. Only thing I don't like is when I am on the phone and it is windy, it is hard for the other person to hear me... i hear them perfectly. I have dropped an ear piece twice on the sidewalk and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. The bass sounds great, battery life lasts for days, and noise cancelling is also very, very good. Only thing is that I very constantly have to push them back in my ear because they fall out. The right one fell out at the gym the other day and someone almost stepped on it. Pretty annoying, but overall, these are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Salcido

customer_reviews.title: The best earbuds that I know of!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of earbuds that were loud enough for me to hear (I have lost some of my hearing), that would sound great, that would block outside noise, that would stay in my ears, and were comfortable. I have tried several others that didn't do any of those things, but these earfun earbuds do it all. I LOVE them! I also have the earfun go bluetooth speaker which I also use all the time and I love them too. I am beginning to look for the earfun brand when shopping for audio products.
customer_reviews.author: B. Entrekin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great then died
customer_reviews.text: I love how these look, the battery on the charging case and in the headphones are great and last the whole day for me. However, about 2-3 months after I purchased these, I noticed people were having a very hard time understanding me on the phone with the built-in mic. Then the left headphone stopped working and just blinks blue but never connects. I reset twice according to customer service instructions and still no good. Customer service is great and they have promised they will send me a new pair. I am hoping this pair was just defective or got messed up with an update or something.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

product_meta.title: Wireless Earbuds, [2020 CES Award] EarFun Free Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds with Wireless Charging Case, USB-C Quick Charge, IPX7 Waterproof in-Ear Wireless Headphones, Deep Bass, 30H Playtime Built-in Mic
feature_bullets: CES 2020 INNOVATION AWARD HONOREE: CES highly praised - "EarFun Free is recognized as honoree for its innovative design and engineering in some of the most cutting-edge tech and service coming to the market."

HI-FI STEREO SOUND: Feature dual graphene speakers that produce incredible sound quality with deep bass and crystal clear treble; built-in MEMS microphones with noise cancellation for you to enjoy crystal-clear hands-free calls and voice assistant in noisy circumstances.

TWS & BLUETOOTH 5.0: Powered by latest Bluetooth 5.0 which dramatically enhances the stability and connection of the earbuds; after a one-time setup, EarFun Free true wireless headphones will automatically turn on and pair with your smart device; EarFun Free Bluetooth Earphones work flawlessly at a distance up to 49 feet (15 meters).

SNUG FIT ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Ergonomic and lightweight design fit comfortably and snuggly in your ear; 3 sizes of ear tips option provide individualized fit and comfort for all-day wearing with no pain; they fit securely, stay firm in place even for workout or running.

CHARGE ON-THE-GO: 6-hour working time per charge for the Bluetooth headphones and 24 extra hours in the compact charging case; 4 times full charge by the charging case and just 10 minutes charging can make 2-hour listening; the carry case can be charged via Type C or a wireless charging pad.
